perturbation.original_text:
Section 3 DELIVER, PRICING, BILLING AND PAYMENT
a. Section 3(b) of the Agreement is amended so that whereas it previously read:
“Heritage shall purchase all ingredients and packaging materials identified in Schedule C to be used in connection with the
manufacturer of the Products. Heritage shall invoice Premier through the [***] billing as identified on Schedule C.”
now reads:
“Heritage shall purchase all ingredients and packaging materials identified in the relevant Schedule C or Schedule C-l to be used in
connection with the manufacturer of the Products. Heritage shall invoice Premier through the [***] billing as identified on the relevant
Schedule C or Schedule C-l. Heritage shall not, however, purchase ingredients or packaging materials in excess of those required [***].”
b. Section 3(c) of the Agreement is amended so that whereas it previously read:
“Heritage shall charge Premier [***] as set forth in Schedule C.”
it now reads:
“Heritage shall charge Premier [***] as set forth in the relevant Schedule C or Schedule C-1.”
perturbation.changed_text:
Section 3 DELIVER, PRICING, BILLING AND PAYMENT
a. Section 3(b) of the Agreement is amended so that whereas it previously read:
“Heritage shall purchase all ingredients and packaging materials identified in Schedule C to be used in connection with the
manufacturer of the Products. Heritage shall invoice Premier through the [***] billing as identified on Schedule C.”
now reads:
“Heritage shall purchase all ingredients and packaging materials identified in the relevant Schedule C or Schedule C-l to be used in
connection with the manufacturer of the Products. Heritage shall invoice Premier through the [***] billing as identified on the relevant
Schedule C or Schedule C-l. Heritage shall not, however, purchase ingredients or packaging materials in excess of those required [***].”
b. Section 3(c) of the Agreement is amended so that whereas it previously read:
“Heritage shall charge Premier [***] as set forth in Schedule C.”
it now reads:
“Heritage shall charge Premier [***] as set forth in Schedule C-1.”
perturbation.explanation: This creates a conflict in payment terms by stating in 3(b) to use Schedule C or C-1, but 3(c) only says Schedule C-1. It's unclear which schedule determines the payment. This could lead to disputes over which pricing applies to which products.

perturbation.original_text:
5.
Schedule A-l. The following is attached to and incorporated into the Agreement as Schedule A-l:
Schedule A-1 ([***])
[***]
[***]
perturbation.changed_text:
5.
Schedule A-l. The following is attached to and incorporated into the Agreement as Schedule A-l:
Schedule A-1 ([***])
[***]
[***]
Notwithstanding the foregoing, products listed on Schedule A-1 are subject to different quality control standards, as unilaterally determined by Heritage.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction. While Schedule A-1 is incorporated, a new clause states that products on A-1 have unilaterally determined quality standards. This conflicts with Section 3(h), which stipulates that *all* products must conform to Premier's specifications, introducing ambiguity and uncertainty regarding quality requirements and compliance.

perturbation.original_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions, and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions, and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect, except those that directly or indirectly conflict with the intentions of this amendment, which shall be decided at the sole discretion of Heritage.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a conflict by stating that the original agreement remains in effect, but then allowing Heritage to decide which parts conflict and thus, are overridden. This contradicts the original agreement's intent and introduces uncertainty as it gives Heritage unilateral power to change the agreement outside of the amendment's specified changes.
